item.title: Corel WordPerfect Office Home & Student 2021 | Office Suite of Word Processor, Spreadsheets & Presentation Software [PC Download]
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the manufacturer Frequently Asked Questions How many computers can I install WordPerfect Office 2021 on? As per our EULA, except if located in China, India, Indonesia, or Vietnam, Private Users and Business Users of Corel WordPerfect Office that have a second computing device may download and install the software ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $99.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:29 UTC – Details)

From the manufacturer

Frequently Asked Questions

How many computers can I install WordPerfect Office 2021 on? As per our EULA, except if located in China, India, Indonesia, or Vietnam, Private Users and Business Users of Corel WordPerfect Office that have a second computing device may download and install the software product on up to two computing devices. The software product may be used only by you on both devices although not concurrently.
Is an active Internet connection required to use the product? An Internet connection is required for product installation, registration, product updates, and some features. It is not required to run the software.
What languages does WordPerfect Office 2021 support? WordPerfect Office 2021 currently supports both English and French.
Is WordPerfect Office 2021 available for Mac? WordPerfect Office 2021 is native to Windows and is currently not supported on Mac operating systems.
Is WordPerfect Office 2021 backward compatible with earlier versions of WordPerfect? Yes, WordPerfect Office 2021 is backward compatible with file formats created in earlier versions of WordPerfect. WordPerfect Office 2021 can open WordPerfect file formats from previous versions; however, to open WordPerfect Office 2021 file formats in previous versions you must save as a previously supported file type.

Please reach out to us directly via the Corel support page if you have further questions.

Office Suite: WordPerfect 2021, Quattro Pro 2021, Presentations 2021

✓

WordPerfect eBook Publisher

✓
✓

Paradox Database Management

✓

AfterShot 3 Standard photo organizer and editor
✓
✓
✓

Multicam Capture Lite screen recorder

✓

Oxford Concise Dictionary
✓
✓
✓

PDF Import and PDF Forms Creation

✓
✓

Legal Tools: Metadata removal, Bates Numbering, Pleading Paper, Routing Slip

✓
✓

Software Developers Kit (SDK)

✓

Item model number ‏ : ‎ ESDWP2021HSEF
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 3, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Corel
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B093N4F3VV

Easily open, edit, and share files with extensive support for 60 formats, including Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint
Includes the Oxford Concise Dictionary, which contains tens of thousands of definitions, phrases, phonetic spellings, scientific and specialist words
900 TrueType fonts, 10,000 clipart images, 300 templates, and 175 digital photos
Leverage Quattro Pro to build, edit, and analyze comprehensive spreadsheets for budgets, invoices, expenses, and receipts

The software product may be used only by you on both devices although not concurrently.
  2. Is an active Internet connection required to use the product? An Internet connection is required for product installation, registration, product updates, and some features. It is not required to run the software.

  4. Is WordPerfect Office 2021 available for Mac? WordPerfect Office 2021 is native to Windows and is currently not supported on Mac operating systems.
  5. Is WordPerfect Office 2021 backward compatible with earlier versions of WordPerfect? Yes, WordPerfect Office 2021 is backward compatible with file formats created in earlier versions of WordPerfect. WordPerfect Office 2021 can open WordPerfect file formats from previous versions; however, to open WordPerfect Office 2021 file formats in previous versions you must save as a previously supported file type.

Price: $189.00 - $168.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:52 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Built for Students

Designed for K-12 students, the ASUS BR1100 is the good learning companion with its durable qualities like the scratch-resistant cover and all-rounded rubber bumper .The tamper-resistant keyboard ensures that it will stay in one piece for next lesson. With the increased need to work on devices, having a low emission blue light screen helps students stay focused without eye-strain. If the battery charge drops 20% or the notebook loses connectivity, the LED indicator lights up alerting teachers that students need help.

Serviceability

Servicing laptops for education can be a lengthy process with costly fixes and slow turnaround time for school operations. The ASUS BR1100 is built in a modular design with retained screws to mitigate lost time and equipment pieces. Its military-grade durability will help battle against daily rigors that can occur inside and outside of class.

Flexible network support

Make the IT team’s job simpler with Windows Autopilot, a service provided by Microsoft to help set up devices remotely without needing to physically handle the laptops. All devices can be configured remotely so students can stay engaged without class time interruptions.

Distance learning

Designed with the latest performance features including a noise reduction camera with a security shield and an AI noise cancelling microphone, the BR1100 helps reduce distractions. With a wide array of connectivity, including optional LTE, can easily integrate into any learning space.

Processor: Intel Celeron N4500 1.1GHz Dual-Core Processor (4MB Cache, Up to 2.8GHz)

Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics

Operating system: Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

Memory: 4GB DDR4 SDRAM

Hard Drive: Up to 2TB PCIe NVMe M.2 Solid State Drive + 128GB eMMC

Optical Drive: No

Display: 11.6″ HD LED Backlit Display, Eye Care certified by TÜV Rheinland

Connectivity: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity

Audio: 2 x 1.5W Speakers, AI Noise-canceling Audio Technology

Keyboard: US English, Non-Backlit Full Size Keyboard

Built-in HD Webcam: 720P Camera with Privacy Shutter and Dual Array Microphones

Media Drive: Multi-format SD media card reader

Ports:

1 x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C with a power delivery support2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A1 x AC smart pin1 x HDMI1 x Headphone / Mic Combo Jack1 x RJ-45 Ethernet Port

Battery: Up to 14 Hours

Color: Almond

Dimensions L x W x H (inches): 11.6 x 8.1 x 0.8

Weight: 2.8 lbs

【Storage & RAM】Enjoy up to 15x faster performance than a traditional hard drive with 128 GB storage and experience improved multitasking with higher bandwidth thanks to 4 GB of RAM
【Built for Students】Designed for K-12 students, the BR1100 is the perfect learning companion with its durable qualities like the scratch-resistant cover and all-rounded rubber bumper .The tamper-resistant keyboard ensures that it will stay in one piece for next lesson. With the increased need to work on devices, having a low emission blue light screen helps students stay focused without eye-strain.
【US Military-grade Standard】Build to withstand everyday knowks, bumps, drops and spills without damage. So, whether it’s dropped from a classroom desk or the dining table, it’s build to keep on going.
【Child Centered Design】Its child centered design features webcam privacy shield, germproof keyboard and TÜV certified display to protect eyes.
【Operating System】Windows 10 Pro 64-bit

Rookie Driver Car Magnets

Student Driver Car Magnet

We are committed to researching magnetic student driving signs, decals and stickers. Our mission is to ensure that every driver has a more enjoyable and comfortable driving experience, to allow other drivers to tolerate you with more space and respect, to reduce the nervousness of new drivers while preventing the possibility of accidents.

Christmas Gifts

A great gift for your family, friends, colleagues and neighbours in the run up to Christmas!

➽STRONGEST MAGNETS: The student driver car magnet is made of 0.7mm thick strong magnet. Compared with other magnets, it is thicker, stronger, more durable and be patient student driver magnet can be more firmly attached to the surface of the car, we have tested for a long time at high speed, heavy rain and snow and never fall off. Tip: Magnets can only be attached to metal surfaces, not to plastic or aluminum parts.
➽HIGHLY REFLECTIVITY: New driver magnet for car is made of high quality waterproof and heat resistant materials through strong magnetic and highly reflective materials to maximize the amount of light reflected from the sign, attracting people’s attention and ensuring that the rookie driver car magnet is clearly visible even at night, in fog and rain, and other drivers can notice you from the side and back of the car. An excellent tool for teens with no driving experience.
➽Unique design: New driver sticker signs will be displayed humorously and can make others aware that you are learning to drive, then they will be tolerant of providing you with more space and respect and reduce the possibility of annoying honking while controlling the speed of their car to prevent an accident. Student driver magnet also can reduce the level of nervousness teen driver feel when driving.
➽Removable and Reusable: Student driver signs for car removable, easily removable or transferable thanks to the magnetized backing. All driver magnets can be removed and reattached anytime. You can easily transfer it to another car when it is needed. Perfect as a gift for your family, colleagues, friends during various holidays, parties, birthdays
➽100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We are dedicated to providing the best quality new driver sticker for car to our customers. If you are in any way dissatisfied with our please be patient student driver magnet, please contact us and we will do our best to provide you a satisfactory reply.
